amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $150,000 in funding for the Tarrytown Music Hall Restoration and reduce the overall cost of the bill by a commensurate amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in part C of House Report 111-184 to strike the $150,000 in funding for the Tarrytown Music Hall Restoration and reduce the overall cost of the bill by a commensurate amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 122 - 301 (Roll no. 472).
